title: Ultimate Business Plan Generator
prompt:
Create a comprehensive business plan for [BUSINESS NAME] in the [INDUSTRY] sector. Include:

1. Executive Summary (2-3 paragraphs)
2. Company Description
3. Market Analysis (TAM, SAM, SOM)
4. Competitive Landscape (3x3 matrix)
5. Product/Service Description
6. Marketing Strategy (4Ps)
7. Financial Projections (3-year)
8. Team Structure
9. Risk Analysis
10. Funding Requirements

Format as a professional document ready for investors.

title: Crypto Trading Strategy Builder
prompt:
Design a trading strategy for [CRYPTO/PAIR] with:

1. Market Analysis (trend, volume, sentiment)
2. Entry Criteria (3 specific triggers)
3. Exit Criteria (take-profit levels)
4. Stop-Loss Strategy
5. Position Sizing (risk %)
6. Time Frame
7. Technical Indicators (RSI, MACD, etc)
8. Risk Management Rules
9. Backtesting Parameters
10. Paper Trading Plan

Include specific numbers and percentages.

title: Viral TikTok Script Generator
prompt:
Create a viral TikTok script for [NICHE/TOPIC] that:

1. Hook (first 1 second - shocking statement)
2. Problem identification (2-3 seconds)
3. Story/Value (10-15 seconds)
4. CTA (last 2 seconds)

Include:
- Exact timestamps
- On-screen text suggestions
- Music/audio recommendations
- Hashtag strategy (5-10 tags)
- Best posting time
- Engagement predictions

Make it punchy, relatable, and shareable.

title: YouTube Thumbnail Description
prompt: YouTube thumbnail for [VIDEO TOPIC], extreme close-up face with [EMOTION] expression, bold text overlay '[MAIN TEXT]', vibrant [COLOR] background, professional lighting, 16:9 ratio, eye-catching, high contrast, trending style --ar 16:9 --v 6

title: Email Marketing Sequence (7 Emails)
prompt:
Write a 7-email marketing sequence for [PRODUCT] targeting [AUDIENCE].

Each email includes:
- Subject line (A/B test options)
- Preview text
- Opening hook
- Body copy (short, scannable)
- CTA button text
- P.S. line

Email flow:
1. Welcome + Value
2. Problem awareness
3. Solution intro
4. Social proof
5. Objection handling
6. Urgency/scarcity
7. Final offer

Tone: [PROFESSIONAL/CASUAL/FRIENDLY]

title: SaaS Landing Page Copy
prompt:
Write landing page copy for [SAAS PRODUCT] that converts.

Sections:
1. Hero Headline (one powerful line)
2. Subheadline (benefit-focused)
3. Problem Statement (3 bullet points)
4. Solution Overview
5. Features â†’ Benefits (6 items)
6. Social Proof Section
7. Pricing Table Copy
8. FAQ Section (5 questions)
9. Final CTA

Use power words, scarcity, and social proof throughout.

title: Neon Cyberpunk Portrait
prompt: Cyberpunk portrait of [SUBJECT], neon pink and blue lighting, futuristic city background, rain reflections, cinematic composition, detailed face, glowing eyes, cybernetic enhancements, blade runner style, 8k ultra detailed --ar 2:3 --v 6 --style raw

title: DeFi Yield Farming Analyzer
prompt:
Analyze yield farming opportunity for [TOKEN/POOL]:

1. APY Calculation (real vs advertised)
2. TVL Analysis
3. Impermanent Loss Risk (0-100 score)
4. Smart Contract Risk Assessment
5. Token Utility & Tokenomics
6. Team Background Check
7. Audit Status
8. Entry/Exit Strategy
9. Diversification Recommendation
10. Risk/Reward Score (1-10)

Provide specific numbers and actionable advice.

title: Instagram Reel Script + Caption
prompt:
Create an Instagram Reel for [NICHE]:

VIDEO SCRIPT:
- Hook (0-1s): [shocking visual/statement]
- Content (1-15s): [main value]
- CTA (15-17s): [engagement driver]

CAPTION:
- Opening line (stops the scroll)
- Value/content (bullet points)
- CTA (question or action)
- Hashtags (30 relevant tags)

AUDIO: Trending sound suggestion

Best posting time: [based on niche]

title: Startup Pitch Deck Outline
prompt:
Create a pitch deck outline for [STARTUP]:

Slide 1: Title + Tagline
Slide 2: The Problem (pain points)
Slide 3: The Solution (your product)
Slide 4: Market Size (TAM/SAM/SOM)
Slide 5: Business Model
Slide 6: Traction (metrics)
Slide 7: Competition (differentiation)
Slide 8: Go-to-Market Strategy
Slide 9: Team
Slide 10: Financial Projections
Slide 11: The Ask (funding)
Slide 12: Contact

Include key points and visuals for each slide.
